::Battera::

She flew down to Cybershark. "Think we are doing the right thing? I 
mean, somewhere in your programming, do you feel....I mean, does it 
seam to you that we are....I mean...does it feel like all this is..." 
she looked down at the ground. "Oh, never mind."
She turned and looke at Vulois,"Wish I could sleep that peacefully. 
Lately, my dreams aren't dreams, thier nightmares."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois smiled, thinking what a delight it must have been to have 
been 
> working with these people just a short time ago. He slumped beside 
a 
> wall and turned to Cybershark.
> 
> "Wake me up in two mega-cycles, and than I'll take over. We'll 
> protect ourselves over the night, and perform the experiment 
> tomorrow. Who knows, by this time tomorrow we could all be sipping 
> energon on Cybertron."
> 
> Vulois fell asleep, but he had another dream.
> 
> It was a continuation of the previuos dream. In it, Battera and 
> Cybershark had arrived, at were attempting to free Vulois from his 
> chains. Than the evil Vulois appeared, and fryed them both, growing 
> new chains oon Vulois. The evil Vulois transformed into Child, and 
> gazed at him.
> 
> "Oh great Vulois! Train me! Make me as great as you!" Just than the 
> being split, becoming Child and someone he had never seen before, 
but 
> some how knew his name.
> 
> "Nemesis....Nemesis Enforcer?"
> 
> "Right Vulois."(Not moding! Dream sequence!), "Little did you know, 
> but for all your mission I planned to destroy it. And now you have 
> done you job for me, and crushed yourself. But now I have a new 
task, 
> and that is to defeat Child and NEVER give peace a chance. And what 
> your doing....could be very bad for these plans. You remember 
> everything here, but when you wake up, you won't even remember this 
> dream. If you remember your memories though, you will remember 
this. 
> And you will try to stop me. So I will strengthen your chains, and 
> never et the old you leak out again!"
> 
> A massive cross came out of the ground, and Vulois was pierced 
> against it.
> 
> "Now let your Alliance personality come back to you!"
> 
> With that the dream ended, and the evil Vulois came back to take 
> control of the body.
